sentence.Network_en: Crudeness is on the rise in all fields of entertainment.

sentence.Network_en: One day virtual reality will revolutionize the entertainment industry.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一天虚拟现实将使娱乐业发生革命性的变化。

sentence.Network_en: You'll need to provide continuous, organised entertainment or children may get over-excited.
sentence.Network_cn: 你要提供连贯有序的娱乐活动，否则孩子们就有可能兴奋过头。

entry.def: Entertainment consists of performances of plays and films, and activities such as reading and watching television, that give people pleasure.

There were feasts and banquets, theatrical entertainments and sporting competitions between local groups.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =hold,表示"拿住,握住,支撑"; 2. 挽留

stems_affixes.word_buile: attain[v.达到;获得]+able可以……的→adj.可到达的,可得到的
pertain[[v.属于,关于]]男→adj.恰当的;有关的
contain包含,容纳+er表名词→n.容器;集装箱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 款待, 娱乐, 娱乐表演
stems_affixes.word_buile: entertain娱乐,招待+ment表名词→n.款待, 娱乐, 娱乐表演

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保持,保持力,记忆力
stems_affixes.word_buile: retain[[v.适合,保持,保留]]→n.保留,保持,保持力,记忆力
attain[v.达到;获得]+ment表名词→n.完成,成就

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包含,容纳;容忍,抑制;可被……除尽
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+tain拿住,握住,支撑→全部拿住→包含,容纳
de加强动作+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿住,拿下→拘留

stems_affixes.value_cn: 娱乐, 招待, 接受, 怀抱
stems_affixes.word_buile: enter进入,走进+tain挽留→使……挽留→休息,娱乐

stems_affixes.value_cn: 维修,保养,维持,供养,坚持,主张,支持
stems_affixes.word_buile: main=man+tain拿住,握住,支撑→用手拿住→坚持
ob加强动作+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿到,获得
per始终+tain拿住,握住,支撑→始终拿着→属于,关于
re回来+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿回来→保留
sus下面+tain握住→在下面握住→支撑

Sentence.sentence: She works in the entertainment business.
Talent,charm,and an exceptional work ethic have rarely hurled any one of world's most successful entertainment icons and the first African-American female billionaire.
As American research universities begin to resemble profit centers and entertainment complexes, it's easy to lose sight of their primary mission; to produce and spread knowledge
She worked her way to success in the entertainment industry.
